tool.name: Compute statistics
tool.command: computeStat.py #for $r in $results: History${r.result} #end for #for $d in $dataset: Dataset${d.label},${d.file},${d.fileContent} #end for #if $reference.refGenome == "builtIn": dbRef${reference.dbkey}:${reference.dbgene} #elif $reference.refGenome == "uploadYour": Ref${reference.uploadYourRef},${reference.multiRef},${reference.genes} #end if #if str($thresholdMin) != "0": Min$thresholdMin #end if #if str($thresholdMax) != "1000": Max$thresholdMax #end if #if str($threads) != "0": Thr$threads #end if $html_file.files_path

param.name: fileContent
param.label: Does the uploaded file contain contigs or scaffolds?

param.name: dbkey
param.label: Reference genome
param.help: Hold the ctrl/shift button to select more than one
param.option: V.cholerae O1 biovar eltor str. N16961

param.name: dbgene
param.label: Include genefile?
param.help: Do you want to include the corresponding genefile to the reference genome?

param.name: multiRef
param.label: Multiple Referencefiles?
param.help: Is this a merged reference file with multiple sequences?

param.name: genes
param.label: Genes
param.help: File with gene coordinates in the reference

param.name: threads
param.label: Threads
param.help: Maximum number of threads (default: 0 -> number of CPUs available)

tool.help: This tool computes quast result from multiple contig files.
